body: I save em up, and when i get to a TDM map, i cash them in for tons of arrows. Its go to be  feeling assured that you wont run out of arrows to snipe with. (Usually TDM maps are one shot kill, and don't provide you with many arrows)
body_tagged: I save em up, and when i get to a TDM map, i cash them in for tons of arrows. Its go to be  feeling assured that you wont run out of arrows to snipe with. (Usually TDM maps are one shot kill, and don't provide you with many arrows)
title: [Nebula] How do you spend your points?

replies.body: I never use my points. :P
replies.body_tagged: I never use my points. :P

replies.body: I don't spend my points b/c I want to know how many people I've slaughtered. :]
replies.body_tagged: I don't spend my points b/c I want to know how many people I've slaughtered. :]

replies.body: I spend them on arrows on one hit maps and the fire torches cause it's cool to put armoured dudes on fire :)
replies.body_tagged: I spend them on arrows on one hit maps and the fire torches cause it's cool to put armoured dudes on fire :)

replies.body: I've never spent mine...
replies.body_tagged: I've never spent mine...

replies.body: Gapples on maps with no drops or killfarms, arrows on 1 hit maps, and speed pots when I'm in a rushing mood after a long killfarm.
replies.body_tagged: Gapples on maps with no drops or killfarms, arrows on 1 hit maps, and speed pots when I'm in a rushing mood after a long killfarm.

replies.body: I save them and buy speed and gapples on killfarm maps :D
replies.body_tagged: I save them and buy speed and gapples on killfarm maps :D

replies.body: Mostly golden apples and spanky spades.
replies.body_tagged: Mostly golden apples and spanky spades.

replies.body:
You know you can use /match in nebula to see how many victims you have slayed?

@op I usually don't spend my points unless I need gapples or speed pots. And spanky spade isnt as overpowered as it used to be ;(

replies.body: Nothings really worth it any more. I do sometimes get into a situation where I have one heart and no golden apples, so I buy some.
replies.body_tagged: Nothings really worth it any more. I do sometimes get into a situation where I have one heart and no golden apples, so I buy some.

replies.body: When I that we have a shop to buy items (rarely), I usually buy golden apples.
replies.body_tagged: When I that we have a shop to buy items (rarely), I usually buy golden apples.

replies.body: Mainly Golden apples. For like 30 points, they should add enchant upgrades on your sword/bow/pickaxe/armour. You could choose the enchantment and they more points you get, the higher/stronger the enchant. Be aware that if you die, you lose it.
replies.body_tagged: Mainly Golden apples. For like 30 points, they should add enchant upgrades on your sword/bow/pickaxe/armour. You could choose the enchantment and they more points you get, the higher/stronger the enchant. Be aware that if you die, you lose it.

replies.body: I use it on food whenever needed. :P

replies.body: Sometimes I get really bored in Senex...
